English.Name: Avalanche
English.Category:
"Basic Information"[CS:E][BAR][CR]
Gives the user a [LS:13612]Bide[LE] status. A Pokémon
that has a [LS:13612]Bide[LE] status waits, then does
double any damage it took under [LS:13612]Bide[LE]
status.
